name: Bloomboo goes Home
description:
Bloomboos are very fragile beings.

When they're not home they can only survive for 30 seconds.
They start to get old and lose speed and jump power.
They need to eat fruit to resist more time.
But fruit can also make them resist less and you can never tell!
Help our young Bloomboo get home before he dies!

Credits:
Ending music by Alex Smith, rest of the music by Juhani Junkala.

SFX generated with bfxr.

Background and platforms assets by Bayat Games.
